channel.title: atheros on Oh The Huge Manatee!
channel.description: Recent content in atheros on Oh The Huge Manatee!

item.title: Still more wireless troubleshooting
item.description: {% raw %} The damnedest thing happened - I went out of town.  I went out of town, and discovered that I was STILL getting dropouts every 90 seconds!  On a totally different router, on the opposite site of the planet, in a rural area with no conceivable wireless interference.  This prompted me to boot into Windows 7 (I have a Boot Camp partition) to try my ping test under a totally different software stack.
